meanings.sent1: The talented artist was the depictor of the beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed the depictor's latest masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The depictor of the funny cartoon characters made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her brush was a magical depictor, bringing scenes to life on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The depictor's work captured the essence of nature in vivid detail.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that represents or portrays something visually.
meanings.sent1: The actor was the depictor of the brave knight in the play.
meanings.sent2: The photograph served as a depictor of the historic event.
meanings.sent3: The depictor of the talking animals made the children smile.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was a beautiful depictor of the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The depictor's sculpture conveyed deep emotions through its form.
